summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3884 for the improvement of East 53rd Street, from 27th Avenue Northeast to 30th Avenue Northeast; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 47427, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
